channel.title: Sacred Oblivion Project-Ideas and more needed-I want YOUR input-
channel.description:
Sacred Oblivion
I am starting a new server because I am fed up with a few things. 1. Jagex ruining the game. (removing PK'ing) 2. People who make a topic similar to this, but don't follow it up 3. People who suck at programming at act like the wfpwnzrorz you. 4. Peopel who don't read my entire post and attempt to back seat mod
[u]I SUCK AT CODING[/u]
I'm looking for a good source, and client. Silab preferred...
This server will be entirely based off other peoples tuts..sounds like shit eh? No..If you put the right TuTs together its fucking hot.
I don't want coders**(Yes I do, I'm lying...) I want Ideas, what do YOU guys want in a server.
My server [u]will[/u] have: Npc training PKING Staking (Probably not with interfaces, but yeah) Custom quests Custom items Custom client: Custom Sprites, 471 gf, and a webclient
So..What do YOU want in a server, in the server's owner? etc.
[b]List:[/b]

item.title: Sacred Oblivion Project-Ideas and more needed-I want YOUR input-
item.dc:creator: @L_s_R L s R
item.description:
@L_s_R wrote:

Sacred Oblivion

I am starting a new server because I am fed up with a few things.

  1. Jagex ruining the game. (removing PK’ing)
  2. People who make a topic similar to this, but don’t follow it up
  3. People who suck at programming at act like the wfpwnzrorz you.
  4. Peopel who don’t read my entire post and attempt to back seat mod

I SUCK AT CODING

I’m looking for a good source, and client. Silab preferred…

This server will be entirely based off other peoples tuts…sounds like shit eh? No…If you put the right TuTs together its fucking hot.

I don’t want coders**(Yes I do, I’m lying…) I want Ideas, what do YOU guys want in a server.

My server will have:
Npc training
PKING
Staking (Probably not with interfaces, but yeah)
Custom quests
Custom items
Custom client:
Custom Sprites, 471 gf, and a webclient

So…What do YOU want in a server, in the server’s owner? etc.
